page.title: 16A day in the life H Milburn
page.content: I got up and it was a sunny day so I put some sunny clothes on. I went downstairs and had my breakfast of cornflakes. At 8.45 am I went ot school and I put the litter bins out. Then the bell rang at 9 am so I went in my line then went into the classroom. Mrs Rowell, my teacher, marked the register then I went in for assembly and sang a hymn. I did some Peak Maths and went outside to play. After play I did my English then it was a dinner at 12. After dinner I went out to play till 1.30. I did some art, I painted or coloured a picture. My last playtime was at 2.40. My teacher read me a story then I went on a nature walk. Time to go home at 4. When I got home I got my bike out and played on that till 7.30 then I went in and watched the television, then I went to bed.
